contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:''Xerophyllum'' (plant)}} {{Taxobox |name = ''Xerophyllum'' |image = Beargrass.jpg |image_caption = ''Xerophyllum tenax'' |regnum = [[Plantae]] |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Monocots]] |ordo = [[Liliales]] |familia = [[Melanthiaceae]] |genus = '''''Xerophyllum''''' |genus_authority = Michx. |subdivision_ranks = Species |subdivision = See text. |}} '''''Xerophyllum''''' is a genus of [[perennial plant]]s from the family [[Melanthiaceae]]. The genus is native to [[North America]].<ref name=FNA>{{Citation |first1=Frederick H. |last1=Utech |contribution=Xerophyllum |url=http://www.efloras.org/florataxon.aspx?flora_id=1&taxon_id=135103 |accessdate=2012-04-29 }}, in {{Citation |editor-last=Flora of North America Editorial Committee |year=1982 onwards |title=Flora of North America ''(online)'' |publisher=eFlora.org |url=http://www.efloras.org/flora_page.aspx?flora_id=1 }}</ref> There are two species:<ref name=WCSP>Search for "Xerophyllum", {{Citation |title=World Checklist of Selected Plant Families |publisher=[[Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew]] |url=http://apps.kew.org/wcsp/ |accessdate=2012-04-29}}</ref> *''[[Xerophyllum asphodeloides]]'' <small>(Pursh) Nutt.</small> (syns ''Xerophyllum douglasii'' <small>S.Watson</small>, ''Xerophyllum setifolium'' <small>Michx.</small>, nom. superfl.) *''[[Xerophyllum tenax]]'' <small>(Pursh) Nutt.</small> Some species formerly placed in this genus have been transferred to others (within the tribe [[Melanthieae]]):<ref name=WCSP/> *''Xerophyllum gramineum'' = ''[[Stenanthium gramineum]]'' <small>(Ker Gawl.) Morong</small> *''Xerophyllum sabadilla'' = ''[[Schoenocaulon officinale]]'' <small>(Schltdl. & Cham.) A.Gray</small> The elongated leaves of ''X. tenax'', commonly known as '''bear grass''', were used for [[basket weaving]] by the [[Indigenous peoples of the Americas|Native Americans]]. ''X. asphodeloides'' also known as '''turkey's beard''' is a popular garden plant, producing spikes of white flowers. ==References== <references/> ==External links== * [http://www.flickr.com/photos/clarkmackey/2552067289/ Xerophyllum asphodeloides growing in the wild in the Linville Gorge Wilderness Area.] {{DEFAULTSORT:Xerophyllum (Plant)}} [[Category:Melanthiaceae]] [[Category:Melanthiaceae genera]]
